title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details in the Observed Behavior (OB), Expected Behavior (EB), and Steps to Reproduce (SR) sections. I will infer and supplement the missing information for clarity.
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset, an error is displayed.
EB: As per template requirements, the user interface should not perform validation. Therefore, the group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be displayed despite the dataset not being set.
